ygData.msgSnippet: You can fear the bad guy and then chase and whack on him. This is even better if you have somebody who is better at melee than a cleric, including a pet. And
ygData.messageBody:
You can fear the bad guy and then chase and whack on him. This is even
better if you have somebody who is better at melee than a cleric, including
a pet. And it's better if you can snare/engulfing darkness the mob to slow
it down.
